title: WP ADA Compliance Check Plugin for Wordpress
creator: AlumniOnline Web Services
description: Evaluate pages for the problems as they are published, run a complete scan of your website to identify issues and automatically correct many common issues.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
